## OpGenSpec interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OpGenSpec<NODE, OP> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [arity](./gp.opgenspec.arity.md) | <code>number</code> | Operator / function arity (number or args to generate). |
|  [fn](./gp.opgenspec.fn.md) | <code>Fn2&lt;IRandom, NODE[], OP&gt;</code> | Function producing/selecting an operator value. If probabilistic, the given PRNG MUST be used for repeatable results. The function is called with all argument genes/expressions to allow inform the operator selection. |
|  [prob](./gp.opgenspec.prob.md) | <code>number</code> | Probability for this generator to be used. |
